img.title: pbis
img.alt: Spread some kindness through our Bulldog Community

div.a: Spread some kindness through our Bulldog Community

span.div: While you continue social distancing consider an act of kindness! Spread some kindness through our bulldog community and share it on social media using #ghcspride and #ghcskindness and you will earn a PRIDE card when we get back to school! We miss you guys!
